Summary: A large number of small star-like objects moving quickly in random directions, sometimes following one another at high speeds.
divs: sighting detailsi was on my balcony last night around 10:30 pm, smoking a cigarette, and noticed a small streak of light go across the western sky\horizon, probably above the pines\michigan city area in indiana. so i watched a waited for more- but noticed something way more awesome! there were 20+ of these objects scattered in that direction only(west). they were fast and could stop on a dime, make a 180 turn at high speeds... it was just way out of the ordinary. last night was cloudy, i couldnt see the stars but i could definitely see these tiny objects chasing each other through the sky. i stood there and watched this for at least 30 minutes, with my mouth hanging wide open and wondering- why isnt anyone else outside right now?! id totally ask them if they saw it too i was home alone and got a little startled when i thought i saw one of the objects come in my direction... once i saw the mass of the object coming closer and growing- which was like a shadow- i quickly went inside grabbed my keys and left. that was all i wanted to do with it...so that was the last i saw of it. no et meetings for me, thank you!
